name: 100% Orange Juice: Nath & Tomato+Mimyuu
summary: 100% Orange Juice - Nath & Tomato+Mimyuu Character Pack adds 2 new playable character combinations from developer Orange Juice's games. Meet Nath who powers up with battle cards to devastating effect, and the prankster duo, Tomato&Mimyuu with their unique tag team play. The characters come fully voiced!
